sentence.Network_en: He was short and stocky, and had a thick neck.
He is stocky though not chubby.
sentence.Network_cn: 他长得敦实,可并不发胖.

sentence.Network_en: He always feels ashamed for his short, stocky figure.
sentence.Network_cn: 他矮壮的体形总是让他觉得羞愧。

list.abs: bulldog : any of a breed of short-haired dog characterized by a large head , strong , square jaws with dewlaps , and a stocky body . it was originally bred for bull baiting .斗牛犬，喇叭狗：一种短毛狗，特点是大脑袋，体壮，带有垂肉的方下巴，身体结实。最早喂养它们是为玩嗾狗逗牛戏。
西氏纹胸鮡(Glyptothorax silviae) 中华纹胸鮡(Glyptothorax sinense) 斯氏纹胸鮡(Glyptothorax steindachneri) 史氏纹胸鮡(Glyptothorax stocki) 施氏纹胸鮡(.
my family is full of stocky individuals , so I don't know why I'm afraid to tell my parents about a guy I am dating while away at university .我家人都是矮个结实的人，但我不知道为什么我会害怕告诉我父母与一个男孩约会以消磨大学时光的事。
a stocky figure , fashionably dressed in light grey , turned and said easily .一个穿着淡灰色时髦衣服的矮胖子转过身子，若无其事地说。

entry.def: A stocky person has a body that is broad, solid, and often short.

means.word_mean: 1. heavy and compact in form or stature;
